ygData.subject: Planes, here I come...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello fellow bards.  I have finally, finally advanced out of level 45 hell.  Hurrah! Of course I have no sense and the very next morning I went on a Vox raid
ygData.messageBody:
Hello fellow bards. I have finally, finally advanced out of level 45 hell. Hurrah!
Of course I have no sense and the very next morning I went on a Vox raid and she
kindly took it from me. Twice. Ouch. Ah well, it would have been worth it but
alas no horn =(. Still, the Seafury Cyclops eventually yielded the re-ding.

By the way, I used the knowledge I gained here about good strategies for Nagafen and
Vox to prepare my song list. Nagafen was last week, and yes he thought bard tasted
really good too. Lost the drum lotto on that one *pout*.

I have 46 to get through before I attempt the Planes - I want that margin! - but
that will be soon I hope. I have read a few posts on the topic of Plane strategies,
but am eager for more. Help me out please?

Maravana Vireo of the Jus Divinum
Level 46 bard of Mithaniel Marr
